mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.anime_id AS animeId, r.rating AS rating, r.content AS content, r.is_spoiler AS isSpoiler, r.like_count AS likeCount, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt, r.deleted_at AS deletedAt, r.isReported AS isReported FROM Review r WHERE r.anime_id = #{animeId} AND r.user_id = #{userId}
